introduction: 马丁·萨莫拉自1998年起一直在西班牙经营一家停尸房，他的任务是将溺亡的人送上最后旅程。同时，他自己的健康状况也在下降，必须接受死亡的必然性。但最让他害怕的是，对无数冲上岸尸体的冷漠无视在欧洲日益盛行。Martin Zamora has been managing a mortuary in Spain since 1998. He sends off drowned victims with the respect they deserve one last time. Meanwhile, his health is declining, and he must come to terms with the inevitability of death. Yet, what terrifies him most is the rising apathy in Europe despite countless bodies washing ashore.
